name: Transformers Game Save File
summary: A TRANSPROFILE file is a game save file created by the Transformers: War for Cybertron and Transformers: Fall of Cybertron games developed by High Moon Studios. It stores a playerâ€™s profile data, including progress through the game, unlocked content, custom settings, and character statistics. TRANSPROFILE files allow players to resume gameplay from where they left off without losing their progress.
